definition: towards/to face/to turn towards/direction/to support/to side with/shortly before/formerly/always/all along/(suffix) suitable for .../oriented to ...
to tend toward/to guide/variant of 向[xiang4]
variant of 向[xiang4]/direction/orientation/to face/to turn toward/to/towards/shortly before/formerly
(elec.) unidirectional current/DC/also written 直流[zhi2 liu2]

sentences.english: The men fled from the One Way Street bookshop before anyone could catch them.
sentences.chinese: 之后两名男子从单向街书店逃逸。

sentences.english: It had a delta wing configuration with a single vertical tail.
sentences.chinese: 它有一个三角翼和单向的垂直翼。

sentences.english: Video conferencing involves the linking of remote sites by one-way or two- way television.
sentences.chinese: 电视会议是将远程地点通过单向或双向电视相连接。

sentences.english: An equivalent circuit model of these 3-phase unidirectional transducers is discussed as well as their adjustment and fabrication.
sentences.chinese: 本文讨论三相单向换能器等效电路模型和制作调整。

sentences.english: One of the obvious characteristics of public communication is strong unidirectivity and weak feedback mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 大众传播的显著特点之一是单向性强，反馈机制弱。

sentences.english: A mechanical model of the uniaxial extension of composite solid propellants is propounded in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了复合固体推进剂单向拉伸力学模型。

sentences.english: Voltage suppressors come in uni or bi-directional types.
sentences.chinese: 电压消除器分为单向和双向两种类型。

sentences.english: Traffic may travel in one direction only.
sentences.chinese: 标志显示车辆只能单向行驶。

sentences.english: Wafer Check Valve is a universal one-way flow valve.
sentences.chinese: 对夹式止回阀是一种通用单向流体阀门。

sentences.english: VRP120 single acting pilot check valves lock a single acting cylinder.
sentences.chinese: VRP120型液控单向阀用于锁紧单作用液压缸。

sentences.english: Here is a closeup of the one-way valve before gluing.
sentences.chinese: 这里是一个近距离的一个单向阀前粘合。

sentences.english: You can be very single- minded in a state of lust.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在一种渴望的状态下保持单向的意识。

sentences.english: He recommended the single-pass waterfall method only for legacy maintenance projects.
sentences.chinese: 他建议单向的瀑布方法只是为了维护项目而存在的。

sentences.english: Yet for too long prescriptions have flowed one way.
sentences.chinese: 处方已经单向流动的太久了。

sentences.english: Channels can be unidirectional or bidirectional.
sentences.chinese: 通道可以是单向的或双向的。

sentences.english: Therefore, it is more cultural exchange between the third with a one-way transmission of color.
sentences.chinese: 所以，这第三次中西文化交流更带有单向传导的色彩。

definition: to seal/to close/to confine/to seal off/to close down/sealed/confined/closed/unreceptive
Tongdao Dong autonomous county in Huaihua 懷化|怀化[Huai2 hua4], Hunan
three-dimensional road junction (i.e. involving flyover bridges or underpass tunnels)/overpass
to link/to join/to attach/connection/a link (on web page)
